as5510

A linear hall effect sensor with i2c communication

Required properties:
- compatible: must be "ams,as5510"
- reg: i2c slave address of device
- power-supply: the regulator associated with the device

Example:

  as5510-driver {
      compatible = "ams,as5510";
      reg = <0x56>;
      power-supply = <&pm8150a_l11>;
  };
